projects.title: Projects

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: UN Global Compact, SDGs and ICMA principles integrated into financial strategy, governance and socio-environmental impact.

about.headline: We are a multinational company with operations in Brazil and Argentina, working in the low-carbon economy to connect sustainable projects, environmental preservation and financial operations. Our commitment is to generate positive impact for future generations through transparent, secure and innovative solutions that drive a greener, more resilient future.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To deliver low-carbon economy projects that generate wealth in a sustainable way, through transparent and secure financial solutions capable of connecting companies and investors to real impact opportunities.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To achieve global excellence in the financial market by 2030, delivering innovative and sustainable solutions that establish Stock Capital as a benchmark in green finance and ESG governance.

values.title: Values
values.text: Ethics, Loyalty, Transparency, Excellence, Security and Innovation guide our governance and shape all the long-term relationships we build.

carbon.item4: Projects audited and verified by independent auditors

ghg.item2: Application of the GHG Protocol with technical accuracy
ghg.item4: Reports compliant with regulatory and voluntary requirements

esg.item3: Integration of ESG practices into the business model
esg.item4: Decision-making support focused on risks and opportunities

card.title: About the Project
card.paragraph1: The Stock Carbon Mazuay REDD+ Project aims to reduce carbon emissions resulting from deforestation and forest degradation, promoting the conservation and sustainable management of forests in critical preservation areas.
card.paragraph2: The initiative contributes to global greenhouse gas (GHG) reduction targets, generates environmental and social benefits for local communities, and preserves the biodiversity of threatened ecosystems.

intro.p1: We have made a public commitment to sustainability by joining the UN Global Compact, incorporating advanced social and environmental responsibility practices aligned with the SDGs.
intro.p2: This commitment guides our decisions and reflects our determination to build real and lasting impact for society and the environment.

humanRights.title: Human Rights
items: Principle 1: Businesses should support and respect the protection of internationally proclaimed human rights;
Principle 2: Make sure that they are not complicit in human rights abuses.

labour.title: Labour
items: Principle 3: Businesses should uphold the freedom of association and the effective recognition of the right to collective bargaining;
Principle 4: The elimination of all forms of forced and compulsory labour;
Principle 5: The effective abolition of child labour; and
Principle 6: The elimination of discrimination in respect of employment and occupation.

environment.title: Environment
items: Principle 7: Businesses should support a precautionary approach to environmental challenges;
Principle 8: Undertake initiatives to promote greater environmental responsibility; and
Principle 9: Encourage the development and diffusion of environmentally friendly technologies.

anticorruption.title: Anti-corruption
items: Principle 10: Businesses should work against corruption in all its forms, including extortion and bribery.

heading.line1: We believe that the capital markets
heading.line2: can be transparent, accessible and sustainable.

body.p1: Our governance philosophy is based on the conviction that the connection between capital and sustainable projects must take place with clear rules, reliable information and robust processes. That is why we structure our decision-making, compliance and risk management flows to ensure that every transaction reflects transparency, security and alignment with the low-carbon economy.
body.p2: Operating in Brazil and Argentina, we follow the best global practices of the financial market and ESG principles, aligned with ethics, loyalty, transparency, excellence and innovation. Our governance integrates the work of the board, the executive management and independent monitoring structures, ensuring accountability at every stage of the value chain.
body.p3: By making the capital markets more accessible and sustainable, we offer investors clear reports, dedicated relationship channels and a continuous commitment to integrity. The IR Portal is one of the pillars of this journey, bringing together strategic information to support reliable, long-term decisions.
